title: DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO (dwrite_1.h)
description: The DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO enumeration contains values that specify info about the ratio between width and height of the character face.
ms.keywords: DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO enumeration [Direct Write], DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_ANY, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_CONDENSED, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_EXPANDED, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_NORMAL, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_NO_FIT, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_VERY_CONDENSED, DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_VERY_EXPANDED, directwrite.dwrite_panose_aspect_ratio, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_ANY, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_CONDENSED, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_EXPANDED, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_NORMAL, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_NO_FIT, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_VERY_CONDENSED, dwrite_1/DWRITE_PANOSE_ASPECT_RATIO_VERY_EXPANDED
